actionCalls.description: returns a list of STMS that have the skill and territory if specified
actionCalls.name: Get_filtered_STMS
actionCalls.label: Get filtered STMS

choices.description: Updated Label to "Not Specified". Selecting this will result in all Service Resources for the selected Service Territory will be displayed in the selection table.
choices.name: All

choices.description: Selecting this choice will limit the Service Resources displayed to just those in the specified Service Territory who have at least 1 of the required skills on the Work Order. This will not consider the skill level.
choices.name: MatchWO
choices.choiceText: Match at least 1 WO Required Skill

decisions.description: exit if there are too many SAs as defined by the constLimitSA - currently set at 500.
decisions.name: Less_than_SA_Limit
decisions.label: Less than SA Limit

decisions.description: Update Selected SAs MR Creation Status to Confirmed
decisions.name: Records_Selected
decisions.label: Records Selected?

loops.name: Build_display_field_for_skills_required
loops.label: Build display field for skills required

loops.description: set MR Creation Status to Confirmed
loops.name: loop_through_selected_rows
loops.label: loop through selected rows

recordLookups.description: checking to see if there is at least 1 record to be deleted
recordLookups.name: Get_Draft_Record
recordLookups.label: Get Draft Record

recordUpdates.description: if the user does not complete this flow, a triggered flow will fire within N minutes to back out these new SAs
recordUpdates.name: Trigger_Draft_SA_Delete
recordUpdates.label: Trigger Draft SA Delete

fields.name: Error1Text
fields.fieldText: Error, you have entered 1 more values that are invalid. Most likely you have entered a value for duration that is negative or greater than 24 hours.

fields.name: ErrorApexAction
fields.fieldText: An error has occurred, please refresh your screen and try again. If the problem persists, contact your adminstrator.

fields.name: MTS
fields.fieldText: Multi Technician Scheduling

fields.name: Confirmation
fields.fieldText:
Success!

The assignments are being created. This process may take a minute or 2. Please refresh your screen to review the new service appointments.

fields.name: NoRecordsSelectedText
fields.fieldText: Warning, no records have been selected. Do you want to return to the prior screen to select Service Appointments to create or continue without creating any new Service Appointments.

fields.name: Select_to_return_to_prior_screen
fields.fieldText: Select to return to prior screen

fields.name: SorryNoTechsFound
fields.fieldText: Sorry, no technicians were found in the selected Territory with the selected Skill. Please change search criteria and try again.

fields.name: SAGuidanceText
fields.fieldText:
Please select the appointments you would like to KEEP. Use the select all checkbox at the top of the column to select every appointment.


Edit the values for columns as well and use the Save button to save this changes.

fields.name: TZWarning
fields.fieldText:
Time Zone Difference

Please note: your timezone is different than the service territory's time zone. The times displayed below are in your timezone. There is a {!MRDT_Get_Time_Zone_Info.hours} hour difference. You may wish to return to the first screen to set a new start time.

Your Time Zone: {!MRDT_Get_Time_Zone_Info.yourTimeZone}

Territory Time Zone: {!MRDT_Get_Time_Zone_Info.territoryTimeZone}

Difference: {!MRDT_Get_Time_Zone_Info.hours} hour(s)

fields.name: saparminfo
fields.fieldText: Service Appointment Parameters

fields.name: Starting_From
fields.fieldText: Starting From

fields.name: Until
fields.fieldText: Until (maximum 2 weeks)

validationRule.errorMessage: Until must be equal to or after Starting From and you cannot create more than 100 days of appointments

fields.name: Include_Saturdays
fields.fieldText: Include Saturdays
fields.helpText: If selected, appointments will be created for Saturdays.

fields.name: Include_Sundays
fields.fieldText: Include Sundays
fields.helpText: If selected, appointments will be created for Sundays.

fields.name: Include_Only_Weekends
fields.fieldText: Include Only Weekends
fields.helpText:
If selected, appointments will not be created for Monday - Friday.

If selected, you must select at least Include Saturday, or Include Sunday or Both.

validationRule.errorMessage: If you select Include only Weekends, you must select at least Include Saturday, or Include Sunday or Both.

fields.name: Start_Time
fields.fieldText: Start Time
fields.helpText: This is in your time zone. Please adjust if the selected Territory is in a different time zone. Your time zone is {!$User.TimeZoneSidKey}.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter Start Time using format HH:MM AM/PM

fields.name: Default_Duration_hrs
fields.fieldText: Default Duration (hrs)

validationRule.errorMessage: Default Duration must be greater 0 and less than 18

fields.name: Status

fields.name: Territory
fields.fieldText: Territory

fields.name: Skill
fields.fieldText: Skill
fields.helpText:
Selecting "Match at least 1 WO Required Skill" will select only those Service Resources in the selected Service Territory who have at least 1 of the required skills on the WO, regardless of Skill Level.


"Not Specified" will select all Service Resources in the selected Service Territory.
